item.title: The Alder Way
item.description: Fort William to Aviemore via Ben Alder and the Cairngorms Total distance (planned): 220KM (140 miles) Total distance (Actual): 180KM (110 miles) I made some errors in planning regarding daily distances, sometimes up to 10KM more than I could fit into a day. Day 1 - Thursday Night/Friday Distance: 27KM Route: Fort William, through Glen Nevis to near Loch Treig (Staoineag Bothy) Weather: Drizzle for much of the day, dry evening.
